title: In a Musical About Penicillin, Superbugs Take Center Stage
description: “The Mold That Changed the World” focuses on the physician who discovered penicillin. And it offers a message: Don’t take antibiotics unless you really need them.
dc:creator: Sheryl Gay Stolberg
category: The Mold That Changed the World (Play)
media:credit: Michael A. McCoy for The New York Times
media:description: Jeremy Rose stars as Alexander Fleming, the physician who discovered penicillin, in the musical “The Mold That Changed the World.”
